Title: From a Cradle to a Grave
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Diane Ademu-John, Michelle Paradise (executive story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by), Marguerite MacIntyre (staff writer)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: As the baby's due date draws near, Klaus and Elijah embark on a search for Hayley, while Hayley determines to do whatever it takes to keep her unborn baby safe and away from the witches. ...
